forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 48. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 39. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
A gentle serenity envelops Boston this morning, as a soft breeze carries the whispers of an early autumn day. The air, noticeably crisp, invites the curious wanderer to don a light jacket, perhaps accompanied by a cozy scarf, as warmth and comfort intertwine. The pale blue sky unfurls above, rather unblemished, hinting at the promise of a somewhat sunny day—just enough light to make the fading foliage glow with amber hues. 

As afternoon approaches, expect a gradual shift; the clarity of the skies may yield to a deeper cloud cover, a precursor to the evening’s slight chance of rain. While the weather invites a stroll along the Charles River or a leisurely visit to one of Boston’s charming cafes, do take heed of the impending clouds, for they may obscure the sun’s warmth later in the day. So, whether it be a quiet moment spent leafing through a novel at a park bench or a casual saunter through a local market, allow the gentler elements of this day to guide your choices, enveloping you in the calm of the moment.
